channel.title: Kw’s Blog (jekyll)
channel.description: A blog about everything and nothing.

item.title: A New Engine… Again (And A Few Other Changes)
item.description:
Update 2013-02-07: Now running Nikola.

Hello there. I have a few announcements for you.

First off, I changed the blog engine. It is now ran by Hyde, a port of Jekyll to Python (but improved).

Second off, all posts from 2009 were archived. If you are crazy and want to read them, see 2009 Archives. They won’t be visible on the Blog page.

Third off, the URLs of posts were changed a bit, but they are fixed by the server.

Fourth off, the Projects page will get a little makeover soon.

That is all.

item.title: Jekyll for Dummies
item.description:
This post is an introduction to Jekyll, an awesome, simple, blog aware, static site generator. It’s a how-to helping you in setting up Jekyll.

…even though I am currently using Nikola, and I suggest you to do the same.

item.title: Jekyll, Welcome Home. + OMG I WROTE SOMETHING
item.description: Two posts for the price of one, right after the break. What’s funny is, both are out of date, as this blog has went through Hyde and is currently powered by Nikola.
